metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6627 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Audio component in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48Z and 6.0 before 2015-12-01 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a crafted audio file, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 24211743.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Similar code exists in FastMixer.cpp jdstrand> Ubuntu does not use AudioFlinger

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
